name: arch::iommu::registers::IommuRegisters::read_global_status

volatile::VolatileRef::<'a, T, A>::as_pt.doc:
Borrows this `VolatileRef` as a read-only [`VolatilePtr`].

 Use this method to do (partial) volatile reads of the referenced data.

arch::iommu::registers::status::GlobalSt.doc:
Convert from underlying bit representation, dropping any bits
 that do not correspond to flags.

doc: Reads the global Status of IOMMU
